Class GameController

java.lang.Object
logic.gamesystem.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controls the overall game flow, coordinating interaction between the deck, turn system, player, and game logic. This class manages:
  • Game initialization and resets
  • Player and enemy turn flow
  • Deck setup and starting deck creation
  • Miniboss progression tracking

The GameController is typically used by the UI to drive gameplay and issue commands such as playing cards or ending turns.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(DeckPool deckPool)
      Constructs a GameController using the given deck pool. Initializes a new TurnManager using that pool.
      Parameters:
      deckPool - the deck pool to use for this play session

  • Method Details

    • getTurnManager

      public TurnManager getTurnManager()
      Returns:
      the active TurnManager

    • getDeckPool

      public static DeckPool getDeckPool()
      Returns the shared deck pool used by this controller.
      Returns:
      current deck pool instance

    • getGameLogic

      public GameLogic getGameLogic()
      Returns the main game logic model.
      Returns:
      the GameLogic instance

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts a new game session.

      Behavior includes:

      • Resetting game logic and deck pool
      • Creating a new Player if none exists
      • Starting the first player turn

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets all game progress, including:
      • Miniboss clear count
      • Deck contents
      • Stage, enemy, and player state via GameLogic.resetGame()
      The deck is repopulated with the predefined starting cards.

    • getHand

      public Hand getHand()
      Returns the player's current hand.
      Returns:
      the Hand from the current turn manager

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Returns the player entity associated with this session.
      Returns:
      current Player

    • getEnemy

      public Enemy getEnemy()
      Returns the currently active enemy that the player is battling.
      Returns:
      current enemy instance

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int handIndex)
      Attempts to play a card at the given index within the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      handIndex - index of the card in the player's hand
      Returns:
      true if the card was successfully played; false otherwise

    • endTurnAndResolveEnemy

      public TurnResult endTurnAndResolveEnemy()
      Ends the player's turn and resolves the enemy's action.

      Flow:

      • The player's turn ends
      • The enemy acts via TurnManager.runEnemyTurn()
      • Game over state is checked
      • The BattleView may be closed depending on outcome
      • Miniboss progression is updated if appropriate
      Returns:
      a TurnResult describing the outcome of the enemy turn

    • handleStageClearedRewards

      public void handleStageClearedRewards()
      Handles rewards and resets after a stage has been cleared. Stage progression is handled by GameLogic.onStageCleared(). If the game has not ended, a new turn begins.

    • onMiniBossDefeated

      public void onMiniBossDefeated()
      Called when a miniboss is defeated. Increments the miniboss counter.

    • getMiniBossClearCount

      public static int getMiniBossClearCount()
      Returns the number of minibosses defeated so far in this game session.
      Returns:
      miniboss clear count
